name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Chocolate chip cookies are small, sweet treats that delight with their soft texture and intense chocolate flavor. Often filled with melting chocolate chips, each bite offers a perfect blend of crispiness and creaminess. The scent alone is enticing and reminds one of freshly baked goodies from home. Whether with a cup of coffee or as a snack, chocolate chip cookies are an irresistible treat for anyone with a sweet tooth.
descriptionShort: Delicious and soft classic chocolate chip cookies.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups semi-sweet and/or milk chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the flour and baking soda and set aside.
In a large bowl, use an electric mixer to cream the butter and sugars on medium speed until the mixture is light and fluffy.
Add the salt, vanilla, and eggs and mix until well combined.
Gradually add the flour mixture and mix just until combined.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto baking sheets lined with parchment paper.
Bake until the cookies are golden brown, about 10-12 minutes.
Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes, then transfer to a wire rack.
